__package_comment: json to load package info to database

versionList.__version_comment: If isDefault is not defined, it will be <false>.

modeList.__mode_comment: If isDefault is not defined, it will be <false>. If haAvailable is not defined, it will be <false>. If runnable is not defined, it will be <true>.

packageDesc: a centralized service for maintaining configuration information, naming, providing distributed synchronization, and providing group services.

componentList.__component_comment: If deployType is not defined, it will be <all>.

propertyList.__property_comment: If modeList is not defined or is empty list, it means all modes are selected.

configList.__config_comment: If visible is not defined, it will be true.
